title: Taken Names That Dont Play
body: My Friend Wanted to make a new account, i let him play once on my account, he played Katarina and  said he wants to only play her I came up with some names related to Katarina, yet all these names are taken and have shown to not have played for up to 7 months, it would be nice to see riot ban accounts that havent played in 11-12 months, and I personaly think they should be removed from the League of Legends Account database only if they are below a certain lvl, example: lvl 10 or even 14, Please riot try do somthing about this.

replies.body: I don't really think you can just take somebody's account away from them because you want their name. Their account contains all their achievements, wins and champions. Even if they haven't been on for a while, they may choose to rejoin again.

Requirements to take an accounts name are this (from summoner cleanup post by Riot)

Levels 1-6: 6 months of inactivity immunity
Level 12: 1 year of immunity
Level 20: 1 year, 8 months of immunity
Level 30: 2 years, 6 months of immunity

^ It's a really long time tbh, like what if they come back to play 1 game and then stop? It's gonna take FOREVER. I say 6 months for all accounts from 1 - 29 and then 30 is 12 months. Like if you ain't even going to try to get to level 30 in 6 months then you obviously ain't going to play LoL for that long.
Like my cousin took one of my summoner names, she got to level 15 and stopped playing. Now I have to wait a year and a few months... Only 6 months have passed and I cbf'd waiting so I just got another name.

Since some of us players are so dedicated, I think Riot should give us an easier time like, really? I got to level 30 before the level 5 and you get extra RP was even born... like girl you should give mumma some of that goodie gum drops.

(P.S : Things got sassy.)
Send support ticket they wil lhapily give you 400 RP if it hasnt been added already.
